text: Mario Toros (9 December 1922 – 3 June 2018) was an Italian politician. He was born in Pagnacco. He served as a Deputy from 1958 to 1972, and as a Senator from 1972 to 1987.Lutto nel mondo della politica, è morto Mario Toros Toros died on 3 June 2018 in Milan at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Milan
title: Mario Toros
